modName: Rameses B Skyrim In The Knee Dubstep Opening Music
summary: This mod replaces the default opening music with Rameses B\'s awesome new dubstep track called Skyrim in the Knee.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the default opening music with Rameses B\'s awesome new dubstep track called Skyrim in the Knee.

To install, simply extract to your Skyrim installation folder.

To uninstall, navigate to your Skyrim installation folder and delete the file \"Data\\music\\special\\mus_maintheme.xwm\".

Full credit to Rameses B for creating this awesome song, and a thank you to him for allowing me to create this simple mod.

To hear the song, visit: http://soundcloud.com/ramesesb/rameses-b-skyrim-in-the-knee

Also be sure to check out http://www.facebook.com/RamesesB.official
author: Alexrok

files.name: Skyrim Music Mod - Rameses B Skyrim In The Knee
